mapper.select: select * from boards order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into boards (no, title, writer, content, regdate, hitcount) values (#{no}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{regdate}, #{hitcount})
mapper.update: update boards set no=#{no}, title=#{title}, writer=#{writer}, content=#{content}, regdate=#{regdate}, hitcount=#{hitcount} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select m.id, m.name, b.title, b.content from members m inner join boards b on m.id = b.writer
